name: Space Power Defender
description:

original Ludum Dare version here

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/space-power-defender

edwingamedev.com

Space Shooter where your power is exposed and you have to protect it from the enemy waves.

Every time you lose a power, your Spaceship becomes weaker.

Every 3 waves you recover your power.

GOOD LUCK HAVE FUN!

Each energy means a different power

  • Pink = Energy shield Ability
  • Cyan = Side bullets
  • Yellow = Super speed
  • Green = Fast regeneration

Controls:
//keyboard and mouse
ARROW KEYS or WASD - Move
MOUSE - Aim
LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - Shoot
RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON - Energy shield

F - Fullscreen
